title: LayerCSS - Landing Page
header-subtitle: Advanced design language based on CSS
intro-description: LayerCSS is a design language based on CSS that introduces advanced features to facilitate the creation of modular, reusable, and maintainable styles.
philosophy-modularity: Modularity: Divide your styles into logical sections.
philosophy-reusability: Reusability: Define values once and use them in multiple places.
philosophy-maintainability: Maintainability: Change a value in one place and affect the entire project.
nested-benefits: Advantages: Simplify writing complex styles and reduce selector repetition.
layers-benefits: Advantages: Facilitate organizing styles in large projects and allow prioritizing certain styles.
comments-benefits: Advantages: Improve code readability and facilitate team collaboration.
animations-benefits: Advantages: Simplify creating dynamic visual effects and maintain design consistency.
comparison-benefits: Advantages of LayerCSS: Simplicity, lightweight, and compatibility with modern browsers.
